Package fr.emse.simulator

This package contains all the classes and interfaces for developping a simple simulator.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Simulator
    This abstract class defines a simulator with discrete time (step by step).To create your own simulator, you must extend the Simulator class and implement : Simulator.loadMap(File) to define how a new map is obtained from a text file, Simulator.runOneStep() to define what is the procedure to follow at each simulation step (e.g. who is moving), Simulator.isOver() to define what is the game is over (e.g. when there is no more box).

Package fr.emse.simulator Description

This package contains all the classes and interfaces for developping a simple simulator.
